title: "Permanently"
body:
Riot i think you need to learn what the word permanently means, i have a permanent ban from boards, but can somehow still post and everything.

http://i.imgur.com/WyJTCdv.png

I even requested the perma ban and you's just didn't do it.

replies.body: I got a permaban also, they are great aren't they?

Did you even read it? It's pretty clear you were supposed to receive a perma-ban but they decided to give you a second chance. The bottom text is just part of the automated response.

Also if you want a perma-ban just do it yourself. Block http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/ with your firewall and you wont be able to access the boards again, even on multiple accounts. Works great 10/10
